Keywords: Avengers , Cosmic , Soldier , Starjammers , X-Men
Real Name: Carol Danvers
Special Powers
POWER OVERWHELMING: Binary has PROTECTED: Pulse Wave. // Once per turn when she KOs an opposing standard character with an attack, after resolutions she can use Pulse Wave at no cost as if she occupied a square the KO'd character occupied.
COSMIC STAR POWER... POURING OUT!: Energy Explosion, Penetrating/Psychic Blast, Poison.
